metadata.dc:author: Soler Roselló, A
Vila Barja, J
López Pacios, M A
Morote Robles, J
de Torres Mateos, J A
metadata.dc:description: Eight patients with prostate adenoma and high surgical risk were given leuprolide in depot. Prostate volume decreased by 44.7% after 3 months of treatment and by 58.9% at six months. Two of the 7 patients were resident vesical catheter carriers, 28% re-started spontaneous miction.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento médico de la hiperplasia prostática benigna en pacientes con alto riesgo quirúrgico.
[Medical treatment of benign prostatic hyperplasia in patients with high surgical risk].
